Judul: IF digital generation of FMCW waveforms for wideband channel characterisation
Abstrak:
Digital generation methods of FMCW
signals include frequency synthesis and direct
waveform synthesis. The signal can be either generated
directly at IF or from its baseband components
which are combined by a SSB modulator.
The IF signal is subsequently upconverted to RF.
In this paper the different generation methods at
IF, and a number of upconversion methods are
described. A simplified digital technique for combining
the baseband components to produce a
signal at IF is presented. Application to wideband
characterisation of the mobile radio channel is
illustrated by a simulation example. Finally, a
comparison with PRBS sounders demonstrates
the advantages of FMCW sounders which employ
heterodyne detection.
Kata Kunci: FMCW signals, IF signals, Mobile radio channel
